name: Medi-Shop
tag_list: medical, medical-products, healthcare, healthcare-products, orthopedics, medical-devices, health, physiotherapy, medical-equipment
overview:
Medi-Shop is the electronic “child” of HaMed Halambalakis SA, a medical products and devices distributor that was establised in 1980. Since then, plays a potential role in the Healthcare Market, by representing top international companies and offering high quality services.

Driven by high experience and know-how, Medi-Shop distribute disposable product and medical devices to public and private hospital & clinics across the country, as well as various Public Organizations, such as Universities, Institutes, etc. Medi-Shop fully equip and support all required equipment for private health centers, physiotherapy centers and cosmetic & beauty institutes.

Medi-Shop distribute some of the largest manufacturers of medical products and devices, such as Edan Instruments, MIR, Metrax, Nonin, Nellcor, Covidien, Omron, Puritan Bennet, SECA, Heine, Welch Allyn, Riester, Karl Bollman, Pal Hartmann, Respironics, Resmed, TAEMA, AirOX, etc

Proving high quality of products and services, medi-shop’s enterprise is included in the first healthcare companies in Greece to be certified according to EN ISO 9002:2004, in 1999, and according to EN ISO 9001:2004, in 2002, accredited by Lloyds RQA.

Operating and developing for more than 3 decades, HaMed Halambalakis SA is expanding according to the needs of the healthcare market, keeps up with the evolution, dynamically supporting the health sector development and providing innovative solutions and services.
